analysis.description:
Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/19/0xf805f3432f4569d6049c60036845959c8e398b15.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/19/0xf805f3432f4569d6049c60036845959c8e398b15.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_owner' of JustCoin.balanceOf (/unique_chucks/19/0xf805f3432f4569d6049c60036845959c8e398b15.sol#53-54) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_owner' of JustCoin.dividends (/unique_chucks/19/0xf805f3432f4569d6049c60036845959c8e398b15.sol#203) is not in mixedCase
